title: TURDUKKEN 3: The Final Quackdown
author: Christopher Russell-Rivera, Samual LaMere
summary: On a lovely day, a visitor at the local park threw a bread crumb into the water near two very hungry ducks, resulting in a quackdown for the ages! Playing as the ducks, battle your opponent in this retro-style fighting game to show who's in charge of the pond!
cover_image: (string) .png/.jpg RELATIVE PATH TO THE COVER IMAGE OF YOUR GAME
